thread.title: #Awww: Shahrukh Khan-Kajol's Unseen Photoshoot For Kuch Kuch Hota Hai [PICS]
thread.title_full: #Awww: Shahrukh Khan-Kajol's Unseen Photoshoot For Kuch Kuch Hota Hai [PICS]

title: #Awww: Shahrukh Khan-Kajol's Unseen Photoshoot For Kuch Kuch Hota Hai [PICS]
text:
Receive all updates via Facebook. Just Click the Like Button Below Don't ask Again 
Hello peeps! Hope you are enjoying your weekend and to make your weekend, a little extra special, we have brought to you some unseen pictures from the photoshoot of Shahrukh Khan and Kajol along with Rani Mukherjee , done for their most popular flick, Kuch Kuch Hota Hai .Well, it is a known fact that Shahrukh Khan is the 'Baadshah Of Romance' but the actress who has complimented Shahrukh perfectly on-screen is the one and only, Kajol!I mean, who can forget those romantic sequences of Shahrukh Khan and Kajol in Kuch Kuch Hota Hai! 
The duo, with a guaranteed hit record at the box office, first shared screen in Baazigar and they were last seen together in Karan Johar's My Name Is Khan. And now Shahrukh-Kajol are all set to revoke their magical romance on screen with Rohit Shetty's Dilwale , along with the young co-stars Varun Dhawan and Kriti Sanon.So we thought it would be the perfect moment to share their unseen awww-struck moments, captured on camera, during Kuch Kuch Hota Hai photoshoot.So let's not waste time anymore and check out their AWWW-DORABLE pictures here! Shahrukh-Kajol Unseen Photoshoot For KKHH [PICS] 1/21 Awww! 
Well, we are sure you haven't seen this picture of Shahrukh Khan and Kajol before! They are looking so perfect together. Shahrukh-Kajol Unseen Photoshoot For KKHH [PICS] 2/21 Kajol 
Kajol flaunting her golden multi-coloured lehengaa, while posing for the picture and she is looking beautiful. Shahrukh-Kajol Unseen Photoshoot For KKHH [PICS] 3/21 On-Screen Chemistry 
The couple's on-screen chemistry seemed so real, that one would think that in real life too, they are in love. 
Shahrukh-Kajol Unseen Photoshoot For KKHH [PICS] 4/21 Shahrukh With Sana Saeed 
Remember Kuch Kuch Hota Hai's child artist, Sana Saeed, who played the character of Shahrukh Khan's daughter in the film? 
Shahrukh-Kajol Unseen Photoshoot For KKHH [PICS] 5/21 So Magical! 
Isn't this picture looking so magical that you can't stop gazing at it for few more seconds? Shahrukh-Kajol Unseen Photoshoot For KKHH [PICS] 6/21 How Sweet! 
Kajol sitting on Shahrukh Khan's lap, while posing for the camera and we gotta say, both of them are looking spectacular. Shahrukh-Kajol Unseen Photoshoot For KKHH [PICS] 7/21 
And with their each and every romantic picture, automatically you get that lovey-dovey feeling. 
Shahrukh-Kajol Unseen Photoshoot For KKHH [PICS] 8/21 
Another picture of Shahrukh-Kajol's photoshoot in which Kajol is sitting on Shahrukh Khan's lap. 
Shahrukh-Kajol Unseen Photoshoot For KKHH [PICS] 9/21 Super-Cute 
A super-cute picture of Shahrukh Khan with his lovely co-stars Rani Mukherjee and Kajol, planting a kiss on his cheeks. 
Shahrukh-Kajol Unseen Photoshoot For KKHH [PICS] 10/21 Handsome Shahrukh 
And who can forget Shahrukh's look in that cool red GAP t-shirt, which stole many girls' hearts. 
Shahrukh-Kajol Unseen Photoshoot For KKHH [PICS] 11/21 
Shahrukh Khan-Kajol-Rani Mukherjee posing for the camera. Shahrukh-Kajol Unseen Photoshoot For KKHH [PICS] 12/21 
Apparently, the character named Rahul is lucky for Shahrukh Khan. Shahrukh-Kajol Unseen Photoshoot For KKHH [PICS] 13/21 The Ultimate Pair 
And they are truly the ultimate pair of Bollywood and we can never get tired of seeing them together on-screen. Shahrukh-Kajol Unseen Photoshoot For KKHH [PICS] 14/21 
Shahrukh Khan sharing his Filmfare award with his KKHH co-star Rani Mukherjee and Kajol. Shahrukh-Kajol Unseen Photoshoot For KKHH [PICS] 15/21 Terrific Trio 
This terrific trio of SRK-Ran-Kajol created a storm at the BO as well as people's mind, when K2H2 got released. Shahrukh-Kajol Unseen Photoshoot For KKHH [PICS] 16/21 Rahul-Anjali 
Rahul (Shahrukh Khan) & Anjali (Kajol) are one of the most loved characters of Bollywood, till date! Shahrukh-Kajol Unseen Photoshoot For KKHH [PICS] 17/21 
Shahrukh-Kajol hugging each other in this picture which is way too cute to handle. Shahrukh-Kajol Unseen Photoshoot For KKHH [PICS] 18/21 
A candid picture of Shahrukh-Kajol, while playing Basketball. 
Shahrukh-Kajol Unseen Photoshoot For KKHH [PICS] 19/21 
On the work front, Shahrukh-Kajol is gearing up for Rohit Shetty's Dilwale. Shahrukh-Kajol Unseen Photoshoot For KKHH [PICS] 20/21 
Stay tuned for more updates and keep smiling! :-)
